name: Tord for Mobile Devices
description:
GOODBYE, OLD FRIENDS!

~ Tord from The End Part 2

Yeah. It’s a Tord from Eddsworld port.

REPLACEMENTS

Norway over Bopeebo

Tordbot over Spookeez

CREDITS

VS. Tord was created by bbpanzu, download the original here! - https://gamebanana.com/mods/44406

Eddsworld was created by Edd Gould, who passed away in 2012. Check Eddsworld out here! - https://youtube.com/user/eddsworld

Friday Night Funkin' is made by ninjamuffin99 (programmer), PhantomArcade (animator), kawaisprite (musician), and evilsk8r (artist)
